biography: Crystal Fairy are a rock supergroup formed by Melvins members Buzz Osborne and Dale Crover, At The Drive-In member Omar Rodriguez-Lopez and Le Butcherettes member Teri Gender Bender. Their self-titled debut album will be released on Feb 24 on Ipecac Records. Read more on Last.fm. User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License; additional terms may apply.
name: Crystal Fairy

lastfm.bio_content: Crystal Fairy are a rock supergroup formed by Melvins members Buzz Osborne and Dale Crover, At The Drive-In member Omar Rodriguez-Lopez and Le Butcherettes member Teri Gender Bender. Their self-titled debut album will be released on Feb 24 on Ipecac Records. Read more on Last.fm. User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License; additional terms may apply.
